title: Alesha Dixon shares first photo of baby girl seven weeks after birth
text:
Welcome to the world baby Anaya (Picture: Rex, ITV, Alesha Dixon, Instagram)

Alesha Dixon is clearly amazing at keeping secrets as she gave birth to her baby girl seven weeks ago.

The Britain’s Got Talent judge confirmed the recent rumours that she had secretly given birth, by sharing a photo of her new baby girl on Monday morning to celebrate her own 41st birthday.

Oh, and if you were wondering, the tot is called Anaya Safiya, born on 20 August. Yep, a whole seven weeks ago.

Sneaky, sneaky.

The photo shows Anaya being cradled by Alesha’s husband Azuka Ononye, just moments after they welcomed her into the world.

In the caption, Alesha said: ‘7 weeks ago this little angel came into our lives! As I celebrate my birthday today I feel like the luckiest girl on the planet.’

Happy birthday Alesha, guess we can forgive you for keeping the news under wraps.

Alesha managed to keep us all in the dark as her last Instagram post at the weekend showed her wearing a sheer sparkly dress with her baby bump clearly visible.

Advertisement

Advertisement

But she was spotted arriving for filming of America’s Got Talent last Friday with her bump clearly missing, sparking rumours she had already given birth.

Anaya is Alesha’s second child with her husband Azuka, as the couple are already parents to five-year-old daughter Azura Sienna.

In fact, the BGT judge headed back to work on America’s Got Talent on Sunday alongside fellow judge Heidi Klum, and brought along the youngster for a day of filming.

Azura was clearly having the time of her life as she was seen sitting at the judge’s table and pressing the buzzer.

Cute.

Alesha had announced her pregnancy during a live episode of the most recent series of BGT earlier this year, with Ant and Dec revealing her exciting news during a musical number.

As the audience cheered with congratulations, Alesha admitted she was ‘over the moon’ with the news.

description: Alesha Dixon has confirmed the arrival of her second child after secretly giving birth seven weeks ago.
